name: thEiAoLoGy
description:
An Atomic Game-Engine


  • Generate Voxel realms using FATE
  • Share FATEs with your friends with links that work in browsers and in game
  • Explore curated realms from the DEMOs and Over World.
  • Each Voxel is an Atom of a system of 256 x 256 !
  • Procedural generation tools for quick variation and iteration.
  • Plot atoms using variance and flocking patterns like birds.


  • City Physics - Explore a rainy city block with physics on the rain run off.
  • Over World - 8 realms clustered around the center pillar.
  • Aero - Bullet Hell where the bullets are alive.
  • Star Voyage - Cheesy 90s Intro Space Drama Opener.



  • Use the Weave or LISP editors bidirectionally.
  • a Timeline that orchestrates events across a song's duration
  • .vox support for plotting complex voxels
  • Drag and Drop assets onto the browser to mix in
  • Download any part of a FATE file as its original form (VOX/LISP/MP3)
